ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // {Yuffie}
“Oh man!
This place looks like a real drag.
And their Materia sucks, too.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // “Oh man…
Everything will be over,
once Meteor hits…”{PAUSE}“I've been selling Materia for 10 years now,
ever since I was 16. Geez, what
have I been doing with my life?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // “Welcome!
Oh, it's nothing.
Now, please make yourselves comfortable!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // “Welcome!
Oh, it's nothing.
Now, please make yourselves comfortable!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // “I'm…I'm so sorry!
It seems I've gotten
used to being lazy…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // “Oh…is that so…
You're here to shop?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // “I'm sorry!
We hardly ever get any customers.
Oh, but I DO have confidence in our Materia!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // “Oh…is that so…
then let me…yawn…sleep…”

dialogStrings:
“…num…Yes, I'm coming…”{PAUSE}“Are you here to shop?”
{CHOICE}That's right
{CHOICE}No, what's your problem?

“Oh…is that so…
You're here to shop?”

“I'm sorry!
We hardly ever get any customers.
Oh, but I DO have confidence in our Materia!”

“I'm…I'm so sorry!
It seems I've gotten
used to being lazy…”

“Oh man…
Everything will be over,
once Meteor hits…”{PAUSE}“I've been selling Materia for 10 years now,
ever since I was 16. Geez, what
have I been doing with my life?”

“Welcome!
Oh, it's nothing.
Now, please make yourselves comfortable!”

{Yuffie}
“Oh man!
This place looks like a real drag.
And their Materia sucks, too.”
